name: kafka-connect-s3-source
title: Kafka Connect S3 Source
description: A Kafka Connect plugin for S3

support.summary: This connector is a Confluent Commercial Connector and supported by Confluent. The requires purchase of a Confluent Platform subscription, including a license to this Commercial Connector. You can also use this connector for a 30-day trial without an enterprise license key - after 30 days, you need to purchase a subscription. Please contact your Confluent account manager for details.
